long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is for users of the android Dungeonfodder 5e app.  It scans for monster stat blocks on the page, and then sends it to the app.  The extension will only scan when asked to by the user.  Click the extension button to the right of the address bar to start.

It scans for English language phrases on the page to identify a stat block, and will only work for English language web pages and stat blocks.
